name: Free Checking Account
description: RCU offers a variety of accounts for you to conveniently and safely conduct your daily transactions and long-term saving goals. A checking account includes: - Fee-free (no monthly fees or minimum balance requirements) - Nationwide ATM access - Automate & grow your savings (enroll in round up & your RCU debit card transactions to the nearest dollar and automatically transfer the difference into your preferred savings account) - Early Pay benefit - Free overdraft protection options - Free digital

howToGetIt: Apply online at FREE CHECKING For link: https://www.redwoodcu.org/accounts/checking/free-checking/
